attributes.title: terrible experience 😿😭🍊😡
attributes.review: So i downloaded the app and it’s started to lag which i thought was weird cause u know the orange king never fails us 🍊🤴. anyways after that my phone started to glitch out and crash and i couldn’t support my orange king!!!!💔💔🥺🥺😿😿😡😡 i thought it was my laggy ass iphone 3 but other people in these reviews seem to be having the same problem and honestly it shouldn’t be kept on the app store because of all these problems. Do you know how stressful it is to restart my phone?!!!!! omg like i can’t even how dare a great man like this create such an awful app for his supporters, and i know these stupid gen z kids are trying to get rid of this app but now i agree because of how awful it is. No fixing for the app just get rid of it for good because it does all of us a favor thank you 😻.

attributes.title: Worst app ever 😡😡😡😡😡😡👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼
attributes.review: It’s the worst i got a message that says thank you for buying this platform you’ve been charged $500 and the app was glitch pls Apple delete dis app

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: You’re the most horrible person in the world,Trying to delete the one that keeps us all from going insane in quarantine, your are stupid. GEN Z IS’NT GOING DOWN WITHOUT A FIGHT

attributes.title: Delete.
attributes.review: The user interface on this app is awful. It is so disorganized, it doesn’t make any sense, and is basically not usable. This app needs to be deleted. A

I just don’t like you, you are really disrespectful to my kind and the fact that u banning tiktok just because of your rally thing but that’s your fault not ours but like they say what goes around comes back around so have a good day Mr.Cheeto
